00001 namespace hdstl{
00002 namespace concepts {

00057    template <class HDS> 
00058    struct HDSConcept {
00060 
00061 
00066       typedef typename hds_traits<HDS>::halfedge_descriptor halfedge_descriptor; 
00068 
00072       void constraints() {
00073          using namespace boost;
00074          function_requires<DefaultConstructibleConcept<halfedge_descriptor> >();
00075          function_requires<CopyConstructibleConcept<halfedge_descriptor> >();
00076          function_requires<EqualityComparableConcept<halfedge_descriptor> >();
00077          function_requires<AssignableConcept<halfedge_descriptor> >();
00078 
00079          h = opposite(hds,h);
00080          const_constraints(hds);
00081       }
00082 
00086       void const_constraints(HDS const& hds) {
00087          h = opposite(hds,h);
00088       }
00089       HDS hds;
00090       halfedge_descriptor h;
00092    };
